name: Rocket Rush (itch) (Bladev)
description:
Guide your little rocket through a barrage of asteroids by avoiding these extraterrestial rocks or blasting them into pieces!

Rocket Rush is a small endless runner made in about two weeks. Aim for the highest score by dodging the incoming asteroids or destroying them for extra points and possible powerups that will aid you.

Credits

Music: Night Ride by Aries Beats https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVz37WOEw1mPyIpx8xPHBmg
